name: Introductory Physics
description: This course covers the basics of classical mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism in physics.

name: General Chemistry
description: This course covers the basics of chemical structure, stoichiometry, and thermodynamics.

name: General Math and Calculus I
description: This course introduces the fundamentals of math and calculus.

name: Materials Science
description: This course introduces the fundamentals of materials science, including materials structures, properties, and processing.

name: General Math and Calculus II
description: This course covers differentiation, integration, series expansion, and multivariable calculus.

name: Computer-Aided Design and Manufacturing
description: This course introduces the fundamentals of computer-aided design (CAD) and manufacturing (CAM) systems.

name: Mechanical Behavior of Materials
description: This course covers the relationships between materials structures, defects, and mechanical properties.

name: Electronic and Magnetic Properties of Materials
description: This course covers the electronic and magnetic properties of materials, including conductivity, semiconductors, and magnetism.

name: Polymer Science
description: This course covers the properties, structures, and processing of polymers.

name: Ceramic Science
description: This course covers the properties, structures, and processing of ceramics.

name: Materials Selection and Design
description: This course covers materials selection and design principles, including performance indices, environmental effects, and optimization.
prerequisites: Electronic and Magnetic Properties of Materials

name: Materials Processing
description: This course covers the principles and techniques of materials processing, including casting, welding, and forming.
